ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception and Ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a half-elf. When I activate it I do get the ultravision effect, but it is hard to see the difference between ultravision and infravision. Someone mentioned
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a half-elf. When I activate it I do get the ultravision effect, but it
is hard to see the difference between ultravision and infravision.

Someone mentioned that the effect went away with the use of a song, but I
cannot say whether I've noticed this or not myself.

---Windleaf.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 6:14 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Mask of Deception and Ultravision
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> What race is your bard?
>
> Galtin
>
> > I can back up the claim that Mask of Deception gives
> ultravision fine. I
> > used it crossing through Neriak as well as in LGuk and got
> the blue tinge
> > from it. It seemed to hold up also as I sang my accelerando through
> > Neriak.
> >
> > I didn't notice whether this effect went away when I have
> turned off a
> > song,
> > though.
> >
> > ---Windleaf
> >
> >
> >
